EmailTemplate.subject: PaaS: Why is it Hot?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=898992&s=1&k=9B02CD718408DCA6D6D2921B4DF0EB7E&partnerref=eDM> Everyone seems to be talking about PaaS these days. But what is the promise of Platform as a Service?
Hear from Pivotal’s Chief Technology Officer, Simon Elisha about his views on PaaS. Be prepared for a pragmatic presentation that examines the open source movement and what it means for organisations and for the developers that will power it. Webcast Details:
Date: Tuesday 9th December
Time: 3.30pm Sydney
12.30pm Singapore/Beijing
10.00am Mumbai REGISTER <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=898992&s=1&k=9B02CD718408DCA6D6D2921B4DF0EB7E&partnerref=eDM> Who should attend?
The webcast is directed at anyone in information technology, in particular IT Managers, Apps Managers, Apps Architects, Data Experts and Developers.
About Simon Elisha
As CTO and Field Engineering Manager at Pivotal Software, Simon Elisha is sought after by C-Level Executives who want rare insights into technologies such as Cloud Computing, Big Data and Agile software development that are changing the way businesses compete, reduce costs and adapt quickly. Simon’s knowledge of C-Suite issues, stakeholder management and Cloud Computing’s impact on balance sheets combined with extensive experience in large-scale systems architecture gives organizations clarity and clear business options. He has held senior roles at major technology vendors and business consulting organizations and brings a pragmatic, no-nonsense approach to solving complex problems.
Simon has over 24 years of industry experience and has held senior roles at organisations including Amazon, Cisco, Hitachi Data Systems, VERITAS Software, PriceWaterhouseCoopers and EDS.
